name: Secret Bunker Escape
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Secret Bunker Escape

Description:   In this game, use your reasoning skills to find ways of opening doors, unlocking locks and using a variety of items to move forwards through the game and eventually Escape the Bunker. Good Luck and Have Fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/secret-bunker-escape/

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
